data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 38,904 believers in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people might believe through him.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador.
Lord, help the people of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador
data.section_summary:
the state of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador has a population of 368,000.

We estimate Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas has 38,904 people who might know Jesus, 305,892 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,204 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, Ecuador into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
